author: ojeda
body:
This does not fix the BoostIO, but is the first step:
- CondFormats fully compiles with serialization code in-library.
- Most of CondCore (including the CondDBImport.cc) compiles.
- testSerialization\* trivial tests run succesfully.
- Now we do not need the increased -ftemplate-depth option
  (however we keep -O0 for the moment).

Some of the missing bits:
- Reimplement the equal() feature.
- Mark the polymorphic types as we discover them
  (i.e. they will fail when importing real objects).
- Fix any other serialization dependencies/callers
  and their BuildFiles.
title: Move BoostIO templated code into the libraries
